content:
Is there any stronger language around required behavior for searching by name than what is described in the USCorePatientName search parameter (emphasis mine)?

A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

@Brett Marquard was testing a server that did not support searching by a patient's given name. Is there anything that says that they are not conformant by only searching within the family field, as was the case with this server? I didn't see anything in the US Core Search section, and this definition seems to come from base FHIR, so it seems unlikely there would be stronger language in the base spec.
SHALL support searching for a patient by a string match of any part of name using the name search parameter
